title.rendered: We Took the TDC's Best in Show Home

content.rendered:
Header image above by Catalina Kulczar.

We are beyond excited and honored — and a little more full of ourselves! — after being awarded Best in Show in the Type Directors Club Communication Design 2013 competition. From over 2,000 entries received and 215 selected UnderConsideration received 5 “Certificates of Typographic Excellence”, 3 of them for our 2012 Brand New Conference materials — and out of all those winners, the judges chose our poster as Best in Show.

And I need to tell all of y’all on Brand New, ’cause it’s a big deal!

Last night, the TDC held a ceremony to announce the special awards and launch its its fifty-ninth annual typography exhibit at The Cooper Union in New York City — a summary of the event can be found here. While I wish I could have attended to accept the award in person I was on a plane to Mexico City, so I decided to send a little acceptance sheet, which you can see below and enjoy knowing it’s SFW.

Below, the kick-ass poster. More images here.
